医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
财富差异会影响远程医疗的心理保健服务约翰·霍普金斯彭博公共卫生学院的研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，与从2021年中期至2024年中期的马里兰州低能卫律师社区的抑郁症患者相比，马里兰州高养护社区抑郁症患者的心理健康就诊的可能性更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/wealth-disparities-impact-telehealth-act-telehealth-access-for-mental-mental-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/wealth-disparities-impact-telehealth-act-telehealth-access-for-mental-mental-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A5EE4856-024C-453D-AC27-AC27-017EBFAF71FC Thu, 27 Feb 2025 14:26:48 -0500 Wealth disparities impact telehealth access for mental health care
虚拟哺乳支持显示出增加母乳喂养率的希望一项新的Rand研究显示，通过免费的应用程序获得虚拟母乳喂养支持（或远程推荐）的母亲比没有获得此类帮助的同龄人的母乳喂养更多，而黑人母亲中观察到的效果更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/virtual-lactation-support-support-shows-promise-increas-increas-increasing-breastfeeding-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/virtual-lactation-support-support-shows-promise-increas-increas-increasing-breastfeeding-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4938f0f-e315-4CA0-BD90-067FE8FF3CAF Thu, 27 Feb 2025 14:23:59 -0500 Virtual lactation support shows promise in increasing breastfeeding rates
创新治疗方法为治疗湿AMD提供了希望与年龄相关的黄斑（AMD）变性是老年人群视力障碍和失明的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/innovative-treatment-method-method--for-hope-for-treating-wet-wet-amd.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/innovative-treatment-method-method--for-hope-for-treating-weting-wet-wet-amd.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AE46E0E6-72FF-4C85-9ECA-FD0A0B79AE51 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 14:19:10 -0500 Innovative treatment method offers hope for treating wet AMD
研究人员发现细菌散布在血液中的途径当细菌克服人体的免疫防御措施时，菌血症或血液中毒就会发生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/researchers-uncover-pathways-bacterial-spread-n-the-the-bloodstream.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/researchers-uncover-pathways-of-bacterial-spread-n-the-the-baspread-in-the-bloodstream.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29cbb41-db53-4512-8e5e-d8e5e-d8ab56e66579 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 14:12:41 -0500 Researchers uncover pathways of bacterial spread in the bloodstream
遗传突变为更好的类风湿关节炎治疗提供了希望约克大学健康学院领导的研究表明，在称为TRAF1的蛋白质中特定突变如何关闭过度活跃的免疫反应，从而大大减少小鼠的炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/genetic-monation-forers-hope-for-for-better-rheumatoid-thrathis-thratis-wartments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/genetic-monation-newers-hope-for-for-for-better-rheumatoid-thrathis-thritis-wartments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb5b5b8c8f-9a53-4b07-4b07-822d-7f14a5cd0db3 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 14:08:00 -0500 Genetic mutation offers hope for better rheumatoid arthritis treatments
新的基因疗法策略可以治愈COPA综合征科学家比较了五个家庭和多代人，以找到一种防止Copa综合征的基因变体，并为该疾病的新基因疗法打开了大门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/new-gene-therapy-strategy-could-culd-cure-cure-copa-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/new-gene-therapy-strategy-could-culd-cule-cure-copa-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AB0E7383-36F8-4AF1-A8E6-560C4A80AC96 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 14:03:19 -0500 New gene therapy strategy could cure COPA Syndrome
治疗的创新组合有效地杀死了急性髓性白血病细胞VCU Massey综合癌症中心的科学家已经确定了治疗策略的创新组合，这些策略合作有效地杀死了急性髓性白血病（AML）细胞，这是一种常常无法治愈的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/innovative-combination-of--wareatments-treatments-treatments-trectivevility-kills-kills-ucute-myeloid-leukemia-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/innovative-combination-of--wareatments-wareatments-treatments-trective--kills-kills-ucute-myeloid-leukemia-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6881dc97-0731-431-43bf-8ead-04f2333333db0f8d Thu, 27 Feb 2025 12:45:42 -0500 Innovative combination of treatments effectively kills acute myeloid leukemia cells
与肺部损伤和呼吸道疾病有关的生物质烟雾化合物生物量燃烧 - 无论是野火，木炉或农业火灾都将大量的微小颗粒和化学物质引入空气中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/biomass-smoke-compounds-linked-to-lung-damage-and-respiratory-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/biomass-smoke-compounds-linked-to-lung-damage-and-renspiratory-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be591f22-65d8-4379-4379-87f9-42f9-42fbdbc58cd8 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 12:34:47 -0500 Biomass smoke compounds linked to lung damage and respiratory diseases
研究重点增加了VZV诱导的中枢神经系统感染和痴呆症风险日本富士卫生大学的研究人员观察到成人中枢神经系统（CNS）感染的增加，这主要是由水痘带状疱疹病毒（VZV）引起的无菌性脑膜炎，2019年后。研究人员强调了潜水员疫苗接种减少中枢神经系统感染的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/study-highlights-increase-in--in-vzv-诱导cnsins-infections-infections-infections-and-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/study-highlights-increase-in-crease-in-vzv-诱导cns-insins-infections-infections-and-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96c41597-a73d-432d-b94c-4f4c-4f4c4c4c4ed7b64e Thu, 27 Feb 2025 12:22:27 -0500 Study highlights increase in VZV-induced CNS infections and dementia risk
